item.title: Google Is Spared a Search-Engine Switch by a Major Partner
item.description: Samsung Suspends Review of Bing as Default Search Engine Samsung Electronics has suspended an internal review that contemplated changing its smartphones’ default search engine from Google to Microsoft’s Bing. The review was reportedly sparked by a desire to diversify Samsung’s smartphone software and consider new offerings.
